QuestData.Title: The Fight Against Fear
QuestData.Description: When we discovered the sha influence at Kypari Zar, I had hoped the corruption could still be cleansed.$B$BUnfortunately, the Klaxxi Council has confirmed that the sha of fear's corruption is deep-seated, and continues to spread.$B$BTo the south, I have observed some of the local wildlife consumed by an unnamed terror.$B$BThe sha can warp and twist its victims into unimaginable horrors.$B$BWe must stop the corruption before it becomes worse. Seek out the sha-infected Horrorscale Scorpids. Eliminate them.
